titles.title: Eastern Europe, Poland - Carving a Toy Devil

descriptions.description: An der Werkbank sägt ein Mann einen Kloben Lindenholz zurecht, zeichnet Markierungen darauf und schnitzt daraus eine ca. 25 cm hohe Teufelsfigur, die er anschließend bemalt.

A man is carving a toy devil at his work bench. He uses a prepared block of linden tree on which he roughly marks the outlines of the figure. With a variety of tools he shapes the figure. He finishes the approximately 25 cm high toy devil by painting it in polichrome colours.
